query:
UPDATE derivations
        SET 
            status_id = $1,
            completed_at = NOW(),
            evaluation_duration_ms = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - started_at)) * 1000,
            store_path = data.store_path
        FROM (
            SELECT UNNEST($2::int[]) as id, UNNEST($3::text[]) as store_path
        ) as data
        WHERE derivations.id = data.id
